name: Hobgoblin Commander
description: A Medium humanoid wearing half plate armor, the Hobgoblin Commander exudes authority and commands respect on the battlefield.
memorable: Its 'Unshakable Command' ability boosts allies' morale by preventing them from being charmed or frightened.
goals: To lead hobgoblin troops in battle and ensure their strategic advantage.
relations: Usually commands other hobgoblins and works alongside military troops.
environment: Typically found in military encampments or leading hobgoblin forces in combat.
strengths: Good tactical leadership and supportive abilities, able to bolster allies with temporary hit points.
weaknesses: Average intelligence and wisdom which may limit decision-making outside of combat.
attacks: Can make three attacks with either a Greatsword or Longbow, dealing slashing or piercing damage respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Unshakable Command prevents friendly creatures within 30 feet from being charmed or frightened.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright.
skills: Excels in stealth with a modifier of 9 while not in armor.
additional_information: Can provide temporary hit points to allies within 30 feet.
Utilizes tactical maneuvers to enhance combat positioning.
Operates best in a group of hobgoblins.
Average point distribution affecting overall performance.
